Name: Oat
SeedDescription: Plant these in fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with a scythe.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en otoño. Tardan 4 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 4 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en automne. Prend 4 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket ősszel ültesd el. 4 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 秋植えの作物。そだつのに4日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no outono. Leva 4 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Вырастает через 4 дня. Собирайте косой.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Güzde ekilir. 4 günde yetişir. Tırpanla hasat edilir.
